name: LVL99: AxeRage
description: LVL99: AxeRage is a gratuitously violent 2D action platformer inspired by the iconic pop culture of the 80s and 90s. With brute force, a little supernatural intervention, and a RADioactive dog, players must free Earth from unrelenting hordes of aliens, robots, and zombies, oh my.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 10 Processor: 1.90 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1gb Dedicated Video Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
